_header: I can find no man now that will inquire
Note: From Peter Idley’s Instruction (2594), II. A. 2197-2210.

BodLauMis416.First Lines:
I can fynd no man now þat will en quereThe parfyte wais unto
                    dunmow…
BodLauMis416.Last Lines:
…Therfor bide at home what so ever hapTyll the world be turnyd
                    in to another shap
BodLauMis416.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.29.
